name: Kiro Gligorov Киро Глигоров
term_start: January 27, 1991 Gligorov became president on January 27, 1991, when the official name of the country was still Socialist Republic of Macedonia -http://www.mia.com.mk/portal/page?_pageid=113,160569&_dad=portal&_schema=PORTAL&prikaz=22&VestID=18237491 ''On This Day'' - Macedonian Information Agency, see: 1991: The official change of the state's name
precedessor: Vladimir Mitkov (as President of SR Macedonia)
